title: [聊天]ChatColorGUI —— 彩字聊天菜单[1.8-1.15]
author: jinvgy
txt_content:
本帖最后由 jinvgy 于 2020-3-14 13:30 编辑 
ChatColorGUI让玩家彩字聊天更方便~    作者:UrBae/Andrew
插件简介
一个小插件，能够通过指令调出GUI来点击选择聊天所要用的颜色，这样就可以不用背颜色代码啦。
可以通过修改配置文件进行一定程度的自定义，也可以设置不同组的颜色权限。
注：1.13，1.14与1.15版本是否完全适用有待验证

插件命令
/chatcolor - 打开聊天颜色菜单/chatcolor help - 显示插件帮助/chatcolor reset <玩家名> - 重置指定玩家的聊天颜色/chatcolor set <玩家名> <颜色代码> - 设置指定玩家的聊天颜色/chatcolor reload - 重新加载配置文件

权限节点
基础权限
chatcolorgui.use - 允许使用彩字聊天功能chatcolorgui.help - 允许查看插件帮助chatcolorgui.reset - 允许重置指定玩家的聊天颜色chatcolorgui.set - 允许设置指定玩家的聊天颜色chatcolorgui.reload - 允许重新加载配置文件
颜色权限chatcolorgui.color.white - 允许使用白色chatcolorgui.color.gray - 允许使用灰色chatcolorgui.color.darkblue - 允许使用深蓝色chatcolorgui.color.lightblue - 允许使用浅蓝色chatcolorgui.color.darkgreen - 允许使用深绿色chatcolorgui.color.lightgreen - 允许使用浅绿色chatcolorgui.color.darkturquoise - 允许使用青色chatcolorgui.color.lightturquoise - 允许使用暗青色chatcolorgui.color.darkred - 允许使用暗红色chatcolorgui.color.lightred - 允许使用亮红色chatcolorgui.color.purple - 允许使用紫色chatcolorgui.color.magenta - 允许使用紫红色chatcolorgui.color.darkyellow - 允许使用暗黄色chatcolorgui.color.lightyellow - 允许使用亮黄色chatcolorgui.color.* - 允许使用所有颜色

配置文件

# ChatColorGUI by UrBae/Andrew

prefix: '&6&lChatColor &8? '
must-be-player: '&cMust be a player to run this command.'
no-permission: '&cNo Permission.'
reload: '&aConfig.yml and Data.yml Successfully Reloaded!'
help:
  - '&8&m----------------------------------------------------'
  - '&6&lChatColor Commands'
  - ''
  - '&6* &e/chatcolor &fOpens the GUI'
  - '&6* &e/chatcolor reset <player>  &fResets a players ChatColor'
  - '&6* &e/chatcolor set <player> <color code> &fSets a players ChatColor'
  - '&6* &e/chatcolor reload &fReloads the config.yml'
  - ''
  - '&6&lChatColor Permissions'
  - ''
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.use &fAbility to use /chatcolor'
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.help &fAbility to use /chatcolor help'
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.reset &fAbility to use /chatcolor reset'
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.set &fAbility to use /chatcolor set'
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.reload &fAbility to use /chatcolor reload'
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.color.* &fAbility to use ALL ChatColors'
  - '&6* &echatcolorgui.color.<color> &fAbility to use the ChatColor specified'
  - ''
  - '&6&lSpigot Link: &e&nhttps://www.spigotmc.org/resources/x-chatcolorgui-x.74711/'
  - '&8&m----------------------------------------------------'
player-invalid: '&7The player &e%PLAYER% &7wasnt found!'
option-no-permission: '&7You can''t use the %COLOR% &7Chat Color!'
option-reset-due-to-no-perm: '&7Your Chat Color has been removed due to not having permission to use it.'
option-currently-selected: '&7You currently have the %COLOR% &7Chat Color selected.'
option-already-selected: '&7You already have %COLOR% &7selected!'
option-successfully-set: '&7You have set %COLOR% &7as your Chat Color.'
reset-usage: '&7Usage /chatcolor reset &e<player>'
reset-player-chat-color-invalid: '&e%PLAYER% &7doesnt have a active Chat Color.'
reset-player-success: '&7Successfully reset &e%PLAYER%''s &7Chat Color.'
reset-player-target: '&e%PLAYER% &7reset your ChatColor.'
set-usage: '&7Usage /chatcolor set &e<player> <color code>'
set-player-chat-color-invalid: '&e%PLAYER% &7doesnt have a active Chat Color.'
set-invalid-option: '&7Please provide a valid color code!'
set-already-selected: '&e%PLAYER% &7already has the %COLOR% &7ChatColor selected!'
set-player-success: '&7Successfully set &e%PLAYER%''s &7chat color to %COLOR%&7.'
set-player-target: '&e%PLAYER% &7set your chat color to %COLOR%&7.'

chat-color-gui:
  title: '&7Chat Colors'
  size: 45
  sound:
    enabled: false
    effect: 'LEVEL_UP'
  filler:
    enabled: true
    material: STAINED_GLASS_PANE
    data: 15
    name: ' '
    glowing: false
  reset:
    enabled: true
    slot: 40
    material: ANVIL
    data: 0
    name: '&c&lReset'
    lore:
      - '&7Click to reset your Chat Color.'
colors:

  dark-red:
    slot: 10
    name: '&4&lDark Red'
    lore:
      - '&7Click to set your Chat Color'
      - '           &7to &4&lDark Red&7.'
